activities.name: Copy Customer and Customer Address table
Copy data for Customer and Cust Address
ind total records for Customer table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select count(*)  as customerCount 
from saleslt.Customer

dependsOn.activity: ind total records for Customer table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select c.FirstName
,c.MiddleName
,c.LastName
,a.AddressLine1
,a.AddressLine2
  from [SalesLT].[Customer] c
  join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] ca on ca.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
  join [SalesLT].[Address] a on a.AddressID = ca.AddressID

select count(*) as addressCount
from saleslt.address

activities.name: fetch names of all tables in database

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_NAME 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT'

dependsOn.activity: fetch names of all tables in database

items.value: @activity('fetch names of all tables in database').output.value

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select count(*) as productCount
from saleslt.product

activities.name: check if customer csv file exists

dependsOn.activity: check if customer csv file exists

activities.name: create array for product and cust

sqlReaderQuery.value: @if(equals(item(),'Product'),'Select * from saleslt.product where ProductID > 100','Select * from saleslt.Customer where CustomerID between 100 and 1000')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as lastUpdateDate from saleslt.product

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Product where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('highwatermark time').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('last modified date from DB').output.firstRow.lastUpdateDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as lastUpdateDate from saleslt.product

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Product where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('highwatermark time').output.firstRow.hw_time}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('last modified date from DB').output.firstRow.lastUpdateDate}'
select 'Product' as table_name, '@{activity('last modified date from DB').output.firstRow.lastUpdateDate}' as hw_time

source.sqlReaderQuery: select lastmodifieddate as lastmodifieddate from dbo.HighWaterMark where name = 'Agent'
select MAX(create_timestamp) as create_timestamp from dbo.Agent

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from dbo.Agent where create_timestamp > '@{activity('LookupHW').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}' and create_timestamp <= '@{activity('Lookup Agent Max TS').output.firstRow.create_timestamp}'
select 'Agent' as name, '@{activity('Lookup Agent Max TS').output.firstRow.create_timestamp}' as lastmodifieddate

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select CAST (count(*) as Varchar) as custCount
from saleslt.Customer

expression.value: @greater(activity('lookup to read threshold file').output.firstRow.Prop_0, activity('lookup Customer for record count').output.firstRow.custCount)

activities.name: check if file exists or not

dependsOn.activity: check if file exists or not

activities.name: check type of content is file or folder

dependsOn.activity: check type of content is file or folder

items.value: @activity('check type of content is file or folder').output.childItems

source.sqlReaderQuery:
declare @sql nvarchar(1000)
set @sql = 'select count(*) as recCount from item()'
exec sp_executesql @sql
